sense.name: run at low power, usu. while disconnected
sense.examples: My car caught on fire while the engine was idling. The CPU was idling anywhere between 48C and 55C. He idled over to a dock near Juanita Beach Park and tied up his craft. Respondents were asked the number of times they idled their engine.

sense.name: (cause to) be idle or do nothing
sense.examples: Because he had no duties, he idled away his time. Gathered in clumps of two or three, they idled curiously on street corners. Chrysler will idle a Toledo assembly plant temporarily due to slowing sales.
